trans-unit.source: An instance of StateChangedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av StateChangedEventArgs opprettes når den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt hever den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the values for the new and the previous <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Hente verdiene for den nye og forrige <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, tilgang av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState>Egenskaper i et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> before the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> før den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The PreviousState property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PreviousState representerer tilstanden synthesizer med et medlem av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>opplisting.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: Returns the state of the synthesizer before the state changed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer statusen for synthesizeren før tilstanden er endret.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> before the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> før den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The State property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: State-egenskapen representerer tilstanden synthesizer med et medlem av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>opplisting.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the synthesizer after the state changed.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for synthesizeren når tilstanden er endret.
